mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_email, user_addr_postcode, user_addr_main, user_addr_detail, user_addr_extra) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{user_addr_postcode}, #{user_addr_main}, #{user_addr_detail}, #{user_addr_extra})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET user_pw=#{user_pw}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_addr_postcode=#{user_addr_postcode}, user_addr_main=#{user_addr_main}, user_addr_detail=#{user_addr_detail}, user_addr_extra=#{user_addr_extra} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pw = #{user_pw}
